title: IIT Roorkee: Fees, Admission 2026, Courses, Cutoff, Ranking, Placement
about: IIT Roorkee is a autonomous university and technical institute established in 1847 and located in Uttarakhand offering over 111 courses. Read and check details about IIT Roorkee Admission Dates 2026, Fees, Courses, 500+ Student Reviews, Placement, Ranking, and more

rows: CAT/ GATE followed by GD & PI.
46.5 Km from Jolly Grant Airport, Dehradun
AICTE, UGC, Ministry of Education & Govt. of India
Google, Microsoft, Oracle, Goldman Sachs, Intel, ISRO, DRDO, Flipkart etc.
For graduates applying with aCAT 2020 score- CAT score contributes 60%, Personal Interview (PI) is 30%, and Work Experience is 10%.
For IIT graduates entering throughJEE Advanced- Selection is based entirely on the Personal Interview (PI) at 100%.
BCG, Bajaj Auto, Flipkart, Tata Steel, Accenture Japan Ltd, Amazon, Bank of America, Microsoft
Founder of InfoSpace and Moon Express
Founder chairman of Jaiprakash Associates and Jaypee Groud of companies
President and chief executive officer of Harman International Industries
Managing Director of Delhi Metro Rail Corporation

The nearest airport to IIT Roorkee is Jolly Grant Airport, Dehradun, which is about 68 km away. From the airport, taxis and cabs are available to reach the campus. Another option is IGI Airport, New Delhi, around 190 km from Roorkee. From Delhi, one can take a train or bus to Roorkee.

Roorkee Railway Station is just about 2-3 km from the IIT campus and is well-connected with major cities like Delhi, Mumbai, Kolkata, and Lucknow. From the station, autos, rickshaws, and taxis are easily available.
Roorkee is located on National Highway 58 and has frequent bus services from Delhi, Haridwar, and Dehradun. Buses (both government and private) and shared cabs are convenient options.
